text: I am retiring today dogged by
allegations of sexual misconduct
representative John Conyers jr.
announced his retirement on December 5th
effective immediately
Conyers 88 has represented a Detroit
district since 1965 he was the most
senior member of Congress and a founding
member of the Congressional Black Caucus
during his tenure Conyers advocated for
voting rights and the creation of Martin
Luther King jr. day it was recently
revealed that Conyers had once settled a
sexual harassment claim brought by a
former employee who said he repeatedly
propositioned her for sex other women
have since come forward to report
inappropriate conduct and he didn't say
anything and he just sat there and
pulled up the phone and ordered some
sandwiches and sat there taking his
clothes off down to his skivvies in the
wake of these accusations Democratic
leaders called for Conyers to resign the
brave woman who came forward or owed
justice I pray for congressman Conyers
and his family and wish them well hell
ever
congressman Conyers should resign
Conyers attorney questioned why his
client should step down and other
accused Democrats like Al Franken should
not I would suspect that Nancy Pelosi is
going to have to explain what is the
discernible difference between now
Franken and John Conyers Conyers denies
the allegations and has endorsed his son
John Conyers a third to replace him this
too shall pass and I want you to know
that my legacy will continue through my
children it's very unfortunate to see
him fight so long for so many people and
so automatically have allegations
assumed truth his great-nephew ian
Conyers a Michigan State Senator has
also indicated that he will run
nearly 30 percent
